price: तथा हमने उन्हें ऐसी निशानियाँ प्रदान कीं, जिनमें खुली परीछा थी।
arabic: وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ مَا فِيهِ بَلَٰٓؤٞاْ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: waātaynāhum mina al-āyāti mā fīhi balāon mubīnun
